wallet_page.title: Wallet
wallet_page.card_description: Please export your private keys before uninstalling the app as all saved wallets will be deleted.

scanned_balance_info.title: Scanned Balance Info
scanned_balance_info.description: Scanned balance is the balance that the mobile wallet is able to use. After sending a transaction, scanned balance may display an amount that is not in sync with the available balance.

warnings.not_saved: Your wallet has not been saved yet! Please save it!
